message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this exceptional product. I think you'll find it's a game-changer. I'm open to negotiations, but I have to start with a price that reflects its value to me. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1500000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I'm not willing to pay $1500000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Can you consider my offer?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm not comfortable going down to $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle at $1350000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1300000, but no higher. Can you consider my offer?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to come down to $1290000, but that's as low as I can go. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1285000, but no higher. Can you consider my offer?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1280000, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll take it.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1275000, but no higher. Can you consider my offer?

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm going to make one final offer. I'll sell the product to you for $1270000, but that's my absolute last offer. After this, I'm moving on to other opportunities.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1265000, but no higher. Can you consider my offer?
